name: Social Manipulation Tactics
description: Understanding psychological manipulation methods used in social engineering attacks.

cards.title: Common Manipulation Techniques
cards.description: Tactics used by attackers to gain access through deception.
cards.bulletpoints: Pretexting, Authority Exploitation, Fear Induction, Reciprocity

cards.title: Counteracting Social Engineering
cards.description: Defensive measures to prevent social engineering exploitation.
cards.bulletpoints: Verification Protocols, Psychological Awareness Training, Identity Verification
